objects.text: Sterling Silver Rose Gold Wreath Studs

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner features a soft radial pink background layered with abstract waves and muted circular accents that create a graceful backdrop for showcasing luxury jewelry. The design is centered around a detailed product image of wreath-shaped stud earrings in rose gold and silver tones. A bold and majestic heading (`heading`) crowns the banner, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) that describes the product category. Below the central image lies a line of assurance text (`description`) listing product certifications and warranties. The price (`price`) is displayed prominently in large font for emphasis. A rounded rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) contains appealing white-on-maroon text (`cta`), inviting users to act.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blush Pink: `#FFE6E6`
- Warm Rose: `#F8D0D0`
- Deep Maroon: `#863A3A`
- Dusty Rose: `#99484B`
- Soft White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Gold Gradient: `#F9D4C1 → #E6A999`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of earrings designed in a circular form with a distinct floral aesthetic. The primary color palette includes soft rose gold (#F6A6A1), diamond white (#FFFFFF), and sparkling crystal clear (#E6E8EC), creating a luxurious and elegant feel. The rose gold metal gently frames each embedded crystal, providing warm contrast while enhancing the brilliance of the stones. The smooth blending of pink teardrop shapes with the radiant diamonds ensures both components are highlighted equally. This harmonious blend of soft metallic and high-gloss textures can be used in an advertisement banner to convey sophistication and opulence.
